memberdef.argsstring: (const uint16_t *a, const uint16_t *b, uint16_t *y, int tokens, int dim, int aligned_dim)
memberdef.name: add_forward_2d_bf16

memberdef.argsstring: (const uint16_t *a, const uint16_t *b, uint16_t *y, size_t n)
memberdef.name: add_forward_bf16

memberdef.argsstring: (const float *a, const float *b, float *y, size_t n)
memberdef.name: add_forward_f32

memberdef.argsstring: (const uint16_t *a, const uint16_t *b, uint16_t *y, float alpha, size_t n)
memberdef.name: add_scaled_forward_bf16

memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t *a, const uint16_t *b, float alpha, size_t n)
memberdef.name: add_scaled_inplace_bf16

briefdescription.para: Element-wise addition kernels for BF16 tensors.

detaileddescription.para: Used for residual connections in transformer models: residual = x + sublayer_output

Supports:
Forward: y = a + b
Forward with scale: y = a + alpha * b
Backward: d_a = d_y, d_b = d_y (gradient flows through unchanged)
In-place: a += b
